meanings.definition: To provide with women or women's qualities.
meanings.sent1: The team womaned their group by adding more female members.
meanings.sent2: The company womaned their board of directors by hiring more women.
meanings.sent3: The kitchen womaned up with the addition of some talented female chefs.
meanings.sent4: His speech was womaned with grace and elegance.
meanings.sent5: The garden was womaned with colorful flowers and delicate plants.

meanings.sent1: The organization womaned their customer service department with skilled women.
meanings.sent2: The hospital womaned their nursing staff with compassionate women.
meanings.sent3: The spaceship was womaned by a crew of brave female astronauts.
meanings.sent4: The team was womaned with talented female players.
meanings.sent5: The school was womaned with dedicated female teachers.

meanings.sent1: The costume womaned him, making him look more delicate.
meanings.sent2: The makeup womaned his appearance, giving him a softer look.
meanings.sent3: The pink shirt womaned him, making him stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent4: The perfume womaned his scent, adding a floral touch.
meanings.sent5: The hairstyle womaned him, giving him a more feminine look.
